user.title: Add LUNOS Fan
user.description: Connect your LUNOS ventilation fan to Home Assistant.

data_description.relay_w1: Select the switch entity controlling your first LUNOS relay.
data_description.relay_w2: Select the switch entity controlling your second LUNOS relay.
data_description.controller_coding: Select your LUNOS fan model. Check your controller's DIP switches if unsure.
data_description.fan_count: Number of fan units (most installations have 2).
data_description.default_speed: Speed used when turning on without specifying. Medium works for most homes.

error.same_relay: Both relays must be different switch entities.
